name: One By One (Sirius Bizdness)
description:
A group of teenagers wandered where they shouldn't be, and now the local poltergeist has to get them out. Unfortunately, the human psyche is not designed for possession, so you've got one shot per kid. Get one of them out, and you'll have made it all count.

  • Click - possess kid
  • Arrows or WASD - move possessed kid
  • Space - use kid's unique action
